title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-445)
description: On July 23, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)   versions prior to 18.2.1, 18.1.3 and 18.0.5
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)   versions prior to 18.2.1, 18.1.3 and 18.0.5
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
